subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
In {{zh-ref|Starostin}}, this is reconstructed as ''*thaʔ'' in Old Chinese and subsumed under {{cog|sit-pro||*dhăH (/*thăH)|to put; to place}}, whence also {{och-l|署|to place; to position}}, {{cog|bo|གདའ||to be; to be there}}, {{m|bo|གདན||seat; residence}} and {{cog|my|ထား||to put; to place}}.

With the original ''*–l–'' initial, compare Proto-[[Tamangic]] ''*ᴮglaː/ᴬglaː'' (“place”), {{cog|lus|tla}}, {{m|lus|tlat||to be; to exist; to live; to remain}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

{{och-l|居}} may be related ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[reside]]; to [[live]]; to [[dwell]]
# to be [[situated]] in; to be [[in]]
# [[staying]] at [[home]]; not assuming a [[government]] [[position]], or not [[married]]
# [[virginity]]; [[chastity]]
# to [[manage]]; to [[deal]] with
# to [[punish]]; to [[discipline]]
# to [[get along]] with
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: * {{qualifier|Cantonese}} {{zh-l|處|syu3}}, like {{zh-l|度|dou6}} needs to be preceded by the preposition {{zh-l|喺|hai2}} or {{zh-l|響|hoeng2}}.
